price: 75. (Moto wana) alobi: Nayebisaki yo te ete okokoka kokanga motema elongo na ngai te?
arabic: ۞ قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul laka innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
